a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual scholarly publications on artificial intelligence
English- and Chinese-language scholarly publications related to the development and application of AI. This
includes journal articles, conference papers, repository publications (such as arXiv), books, and theses.
Data source: Center for Security and Emerging Technology (2024)
